summary: The module defines a command‑line driven script that prepares image data, constructs a capsule network model, configures an optimizer, and runs a training routine with optional evaluation, using PyTorch and torchvision utilities.
business_intent: Offer a ready‑to‑run example for training a capsule‑based neural network on a standard image classification dataset, illustrating how to set up data pipelines, model instantiation, and optimization in PyTorch.
